```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  
  #create a layout
  sidebarLayout(
    #sidebar
  sidebarPanel(
    #user select input of question
    selectInput(inputId = "question",
              label = "Select your instered question: ",
              choices = unique(questions),
              selected = NULL)),
  #user select input of category
  selectInput(inputId = "catergory",
              label = "Select your interested catergory: ",
              choices = unique(),
              selected = NULL),
  #main
  mainPanel(
    tabsetPanel(
      tabPanel("Distribution", plotOutput("selected_graph")),
    #position of sidebar
    position = c("left"),
    #fixed
    fluid = FALSE))))

server <- function(input, output) {
  
  #filter out flights
  flights2 <- reactive({
    filter(data_frame_name, question==input$question & category==input$category)})
  
  #output of ggplot
  output$selected_graph <- renderPlot({
    ggplot(data=data_frame_name,aes(x=week,y=percent, group = response))+
      geom_point()+geom_line(aes(color=response))
      ggtitle(paste("Proportional Changes in Answer Based on ",input$category,"of",input$destination))})
  
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```
